div.p: The mission of the Woodbridge School District is to educate all students to become highly successful, healthy, and contributing citizens in a global society.

td.br: Please take a moment to look around. We hope that you find it fun and informative.
Please click here to find all necessary Crisis Contact Numbers

td.a: Woodbridge School District Feeding Times and Locations
td.br: The Woodbridge School District will continue to offer grab and go meals for students at various times and locations throughout the district.

td.a: Woodbridge School District Coronavirus Preparedness Plan
td.br: Included with this letter is a plan that the District will follow as the Coronavirus situation continues to develop.
